webpage.title: Habitat for Humanity London
webpage.article:
The ReStore sells new and slightly used renovation materials and supplies for at least 50% off retail.
You'll find lots of materials in our showroom, including
Furniture
Appliances
Cabinetry
Bathroom & Kitchen Fixtures
Doors & Windows
Flooring
Heating Fixtures
Lumber & Trim
Hardware
Everything sold in the ReStore has been donated by companies and individuals who want to help Habitat for Humanity London. Thanks to donors, volunteers and recycling, we are able to sell everything for a low price.
Hours, Directions The ReStore is open for business Mon-Fri 9-5:30 and Sat 9-4 except on holidays. Reach us by phone at 519-659-1949, by e-mail, or visit our London ReStore showroom located at:
Unit 6, 45 Pacific Ct,
London, ON, N5V 3N4.
[show map]
Donate
To donate materials, simply give us a call at 519-659-1949. The ReStore needs new and used building materials that are resalable, repairable and/or reusable.
Volunteer
The ReStore itself needs volunteers for regular 4 hour time slots, Monday through Saturday. For this position you don't have to be experienced in construction or sales.
We will teach you to:
run a cash register (it's easy),
know the products, and
deal with customers.
The warehouse needs volunteers throughout the week to do basic cleanup, to receive and to sort and shelve products.
We also need truck drivers and helpers; no special licence is required.
If you'd like to help, please fill out and mail a ReStore Volunteer Form (PDF).
